name: CreateProjectTemplate
description:
Create a project template in Asana asynchronously.

This tool triggers the creation of a project template in Asana and returns details of the asynchronous job handling the process. Use this to save an existing project as a template, enabling its reuse.

parameters.name: project_global_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the project. Required to specify which project is being saved as a template.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.

parameters.name: include_optional_properties
parameters.description: Specify a list of optional properties to include in the response by listing their names as strings.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: template_name
parameters.description: The name of the new project template in Asana.

value_schema.description: The name of the new project template.

parameters.name: team_id_for_project_template
parameters.description: Specify the team ID for the new project template. Use this when the project is in an organization.

value_schema.description: Sets the team of the new project template. If the project exists in an organization, specify team and not workspace.

parameters.name: workspace_id_for_project_template
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace of the new project template. Use only if the project is in a workspace.

value_schema.description: Sets the workspace of the new project template. Only specify workspace if the project exists in a workspace.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Enable pretty output formatting for easier readability in the response. Use mainly for debugging as it may increase response time and size.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

parameters.name: make_template_public
parameters.description: Specify true to make the project template public to its team. Use false to keep it private.

value_schema.description: Sets the project template to public to its team.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.name: opt_pretty
parameters.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

parameters.name: opt_fields
parameters.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: project_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.

parameters.name: data.name
parameters.description: The name of the new project template.

value_schema.description: The name of the new project template.

parameters.name: data.team
parameters.description: Sets the team of the new project template. If the project exists in an organization, specify team and not workspace.

value_schema.description: Sets the team of the new project template. If the project exists in an organization, specify team and not workspace.

parameters.name: data.workspace
parameters.description: Sets the workspace of the new project template. Only specify workspace if the project exists in a workspace.

value_schema.description: Sets the workspace of the new project template. Only specify workspace if the project exists in a workspace.

parameters.name: data.public
parameters.description: Sets the project template to public to its team.

value_schema.description: Sets the project template to public to its team.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
